      • getSubscriber

        public Subscriber getSubscriber(java.lang.String address,
                                java.lang.Integer port,
                                Topic topic)
        Attempt to locate a subscriber by remote address, port and topic object.
        Parameters:
        address - : The remote IP or hostname of the client
        port - : The remote port of the client
        topic - : The topic object you want the subscriber object for
        Returns:
        The Subscriber, if found, null otherwise.

        Private helper method fo fire the subscriptionChange method on all listners.
        Parameters:
        sub - : The particular subscriber object that has changed.
        type - : What type of action is associated with the subscriber object.
